Questions.Question: Which of the folowing does not contribute significantly to the operational value of a large cloud provider like AWS
Answers: B: Highly experienced teams of security engineers
C: Deep experience in the retail sphere

Questions.Question: Which of the folowing are signs of a highly available application (Select TWO)
Answers: A: A failure in one geographic region will trigger an automatic failover to recources in a different region.
B: Applications are protected behind  multiple layers of security.
C: Virtualized hypervisor-driven systems are deployed as mandated by company policy.
D: Spikes in user demand are met through automatically increasing resources

Questions.Question: How does the metered payment model make many benifits of cloud computing possible (Select TWO)
Answers: A: Greater application security is now possible.
B: Experiments with multiple configuration options are now cost-effective.
C: Applications are now highly scalable
D: Full-stack applications are possible without the need to invest in capital expenses.
